articles.description: Australian athletes hoping to win gold at the Tokyo Olympics are busy training as the IOC insists the Games will not be cancelled, but one epidemiologist argues holding the event makes no "public health sense".
articles.content:
Jake Birtwhistle went seven years without a real winter, until 2020 hit.
Key points:
<ul><li>The IOC has revealed the first version of a 'playbook' that explains how they will be keeping athletes, … [+9172 chars]

articles.title: The Alan Joyce quote that haunted Dragons’ major sponsor over Folau - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: It’s one of the longest associations in Australian sporting history, but it was going to be subject for debate if the Dragons signed Israel Folau.
articles.content:
The Herald broke the news that the club was pursuing Folau on Tuesday, just hours after captain Cameron McInnes signed a four-year deal to join bitter rivals Cronulla from 2022.
